summary.span: 持有服务器信道接收器的堆栈。

span.span: Holds the stack of server channel sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类，使链接要求。This class makes a link demand. 如果直接调用方没有基础结构的权限，则会引发一个安全异常。A security exception is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)有关详细信息。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information.

summary.span: 请求对当前接收器堆栈中接收器的方法调用进行异步处理。

span.span: Requests asynchronous processing of a method call on the sinks in the current sink stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会初始化当前的接收器堆栈的顶部接收器上的异步处理。This method initializes asynchronous processing on the top sink in the current sink stack. 有关其他信息，请参阅方法。For additional information, see the method.

span.span: The current sink stack is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回通过返回的流使用调用`msg`和`headers`参数 ( (`msg`， `headers`)) 上当前的接收器堆栈的顶部接收器。This method returns the stream returned by the called with the `msg` and `headers` parameters ( (`msg`, `headers`)) on the top sink in the current sink stack. 接收器堆栈的顶部接收器保持不变。The top sink in the sink stack remains unchanged.

param.name: sink

span.span: The sink to remove and return from the sink stack.

summary.span: 弹出与接收器堆栈中指定接收器（含）之下的所有接收器关联的信息。

span.span: Pops the information associated with all the sinks from the sink stack up to and including the specified sink.

returns.span: 在请求端生成的、与指定接收器关联的信息。

span.span: Information generated on the request side and associated with the specified sink.

exception.span: 当前接收器堆栈为空，或者从未将指定接收器推送到当前堆栈中。

span.span: The current sink stack is empty, or the specified sink was never pushed onto the current stack.

summary.span: 将指定的接收器和与之关联的信息推送到接收器堆栈中。

span.span: Pushes the specified sink and information associated with it onto the sink stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信息请求端上生成并中指定`state`参数中返回`state`参数相应接收器上的方法。The information generated on the request side and specified in the `state` parameter is returned in the `state` parameter of the method on the corresponding sink.

param.name: ar
param.span: 对远程对象执行的异步操作的状态。

span.span: The status and state of an asynchronous operation on a remote object.

summary.span: 提供一个 委托，用于在异步调度消息后处理回调。

span.span: Provides a delegate to handle a callback after a message has been dispatched asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调度的消息表示远程对象上的请求方法调用。The dispatched message represents a request method call on a remote object. 方法适合仅由.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用。The method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure. 你应不直接调用它。You should not call it directly.

summary.span: 存储消息接收器及其关联状态，用于以后的异步处理。

span.span: Stores a message sink and its associated state for later asynchronous processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法适合仅由.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用。The method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure. 你应不直接调用它。You should not call it directly.

span.span: The current sink stack is empty.

MemberSignature.Value: public void StoreAndDispatch (System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink sink, object state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StoreAndDispatch(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink sink, object state) cil managed
Public Sub StoreAndDispatch (sink As IServerChannelSink, state As Object)
public: virtual void StoreAndDispatch(System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IServerChannelSink ^ sink, System::Object ^ state);

span.span: A server channel sink.

param.name: state
param.span: 与 sink 关联的状态。

span.span: The state associated with sink.

summary.span: 存储消息接收器及其关联状态，然后使用刚刚存储的接收器或已存储的任意其他接收器来异步调度消息。

span.span: Stores a message sink and its associated state, and then dispatches a message asynchronously, using the sink just stored and any other stored sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法适合仅由.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用。The method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure. 你应不直接调用它。You should not call it directly. 该方法应只调用由传输接收器以完成异步调度。The method should be only called by a transport sink to complete an asynchronous dispatch.

permission.span: 用于操作基础结构代码。

span.span: for operating with infrastructure code.
